typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SecurityMasterRaw
Serialization aggregate(SNo = count('SNo') -2) ~> RowCount
SecurityMasterRaw keyGenerate(output(SNo as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> Serialization
RowCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> RowCountSink
